content: Zelda, everyone is under attack by the evil forces of the birds! I'm going to Gamelon to attack. If you don't hear from me in a month, send Link.
translations: ita:Zelda, tutti sono sotto attacco da parte delle forze del male degli uccelli! Io vado a Gamelon per attaccare. Se non si
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Ooneykcall (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
